creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: cowrie shell covered headdress; tan fabric base covered with shells; 8" strip of plain fabric at bottom; semicircular top portion; fabric is over board or cardboard; 7 protrusions on curved edge; eye and nose holes on one side; tassels with shells attached on top portion
dimension: 25 x 18 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. (63.5 x 46.36 x 5.72 cm) (measured flat)
title: Ceremonial headdress
